problem.p: Some problems, called "Formula Input" or "Math Expression Input" problems, require you to enter a mathematical expression in order to get a correct answer. This sample problem gives you a chance to practice this skill.

These problems use a notation similar to what you might see in a graphing calculator. If you have used the TI series of calculators, this will be familiar to you. If not, just click on "Show Answer" to see what the notation looks like.
